session.Description: available sessions(situations), each situation is labelled with an increasing number and letter indicative of the time respective to the surgical resection and the position of the electrodes

age.Description: age of the patient at the time of recording

sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

etiology.Description: clinical diagnosis of the patient with epilepsy

follow_up.Description: number of months the patient was followed up after the surgery
